q: As Michael Davis sees it, The News has a vendetta against Caraway because the paper didn't like the positions that the mayor pro tem took on last year's property tax hike. "We confirm that Andy Coulson has resigned, an official in Prime Minister David Cameron 's office said. legislator Chris Bryant , who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Chris Bryant said the police had "severely" damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. EDUCATION

to lift her legs on command. With her closest friends from Congress holding her hand Wednesday evening, Gabrielle Giffords opened her left eye and tried to focus on loved ones for the first time.
